CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 5, 1953, p.5, reads: "DISTRICT FIRES ROUT FAMILIES - ...Arny Dillard, who is blind, lost most of his possessions when fire did an estimated damage of $250 to his apartment Thanksgiving morning.
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Arny Dillard, standing on a ladder scraping paint, in interior of apartment with peeling paint, fire damage, and broken window
